mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CARD_BEHAVIOR_LOG ( LOG_NO, MEMBER_NO, CARD_NO, BEHAVIOR_TYPE, BEHAVIOR_TIME, DEVICE_TYPE, USER_AGENT, IP_ADDRESS ) VALUES ( SEQ_CARD_BEHAVIOR_LOG.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{cardNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{behaviorType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{behaviorTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deviceType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAgent, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ipAddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
